name: LH HTML Cleaner
author: Peter Shaw

sections.description: This plugins allows you to have a configurable list of html elements and html element attributes that will be removed from the content of posts,pages, and custom post types when they are saved.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire lh-html-cleaner folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Settings->HTML Cleaner (Network Admin->Settings->HTML Cleaner if the plugin is network activated) and enter the blacklisted elements and attributes.

sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire lh-html-cleaner folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to Settings->HTML Cleaner (Network Admin->Settings->HTML Cleaner if the plugin is network activated) and enter the blacklisted elements and attributes.

short_description: Removes blacklisted html tags and attributes.
description: This plugins allows you to have a configurable list of html elements and html element attributes that will be removed from the content of posts,pages, and custom post types when they are saved.
